messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Don't leave, Sheri!
messages.msgSnippet: Don t leave! What I m doing is going No Mail and then I ll turn it back on in a week or so when I *hope* this has all blown over. At first I was reading the
messages.messageBody:
Don't leave! What I'm doing is going No Mail and then I'll turn it back
on in a week or so when I *hope* this has all blown over. At first I was
reading the posts, but then I got so upset I started deleting any from
the Feminism/Institutionalizing thread without reading them. Now I have
to delet the Spanking ones too! I finally got tired of deleting almost
every unschooling email I've gotten in the last few days :-) But you
don't have to unsubscribe! Go to eGroups and check "No Mail".

Actually, I already went No Mail, but it takes a few hours to kick in.

See y'all later!

Shannon, Mom to Bridget


metta wrote:
> on 6/28/00 3:37 PM, Sheri Ponzi <purple_sage@...> wrote:
>
> > This whole feminism discussion has driven me crazy and now people are going
> > to advocate or condone spanking. I htink I am on the worng list here.
> >
> > I'll be leaving now.
>
> Please don't leave! I decided not to reply at all to the spanking thread.
> I've been in enough spanking debates online. But you are not the only one
> who believes that >>Spanking is correction, beating is abuse.<< is a silly
> semantic excuse for hitting their children.
> --
> Thea
> metta@...
